# Sismo Connect Request Cheatsheet

This cheatsheet shows you all the current request you can make with Sismo Connect:

Below it the code to:&#x20;

* Add impersonated Data Sources to your dev vault
* Request a large and diversified set of Data Sources/ Data Gems ownerships

<details>

<summary>How the Request and Response look like ðŸ‘‰ <a href="https://test-request.sismo.io">https://test-request.sismo.io </a></summary>

\
SIsmo Connect Response generation (ZK Proof generation)

<img src="../.gitbook/assets/Screenshot 2023-07-01 at 20.03.35.png" alt="" data-size="original">

SIsmo Connect Response (with ZK Proof in it)

<img src="../.gitbook/assets/Screenshot 2023-07-01 at 21.16.47.png" alt="" data-size="original">

</details>

### Frontend: Make a Sismo Connect Request with React Button

```tsx
// react page
import {
  SismoConnectButton,
  SismoConnectConfig,
  ClaimRequest,
  AuthRequest,
  SignatureRequest,

} from "@sismo-core/sismo-connect-react";

const config: SismoConnectConfig = {
  appId: "0x32403ced4b65f2079eda77c84e7d2be6",
  vault: {
    // For development purposes insert the Data Sources that you want to impersonate
    // Never use this in production
    impersonate: [
      // EVM Data Sources
      "dhadrien.sismo.eth",
      "leo21.sismo.eth",
      "0xA4C94A6091545e40fc9c3E0982AEc8942E282F38",
      "vitalik.eth",
      // Github Data Source
      "github:dhadrien",
      // Twitter Data Source
      "twitter:dhadrien_",
      // Telegram Data Source
      "telegram:dhadrien",
    ],
  },
  displayRawResponse: true, // this enables you to get access directly to the 
  // Sismo Connect Response in the vault instead of redirecting back to the app
};

// button that will redirect to users faults
export default function Home() {
return (
  <SismoConnectButton
    config={config}
    // Auths = Data Source Ownership Requests
    auths={[
      // Anonymous identifier of the vault for this app
      // vaultId = hash(vaultSecret, appId).
      // full docs: https://docs.sismo.io/sismo-docs/build-with-sismo-connect/technical-documentation/vault-and-proof-identifiers
      { authType: AuthType.VAULT },
      // can choose any EVM account from the vault
      { authType: AuthType.EVM_ACCOUNT },
      {
        authType: AuthType.EVM_ACCOUNT,
        userId: "0xA4C94A6091545e40fc9c3E0982AEc8942E282F38", // impersonated
      },
      // part of the vault
      { authType: AuthType.GITHUB },
      // twitter id of @VitalikButerin, not part of the vault
      { authType: AuthType.TWITTER, userId: "295218901", isOptional: true },
      // telegram of @dhadrien
      { authType: AuthType.TELEGRAM, userId: "875608110", isOptional: true },
    ]}
    // Claims = Data Gems Ownership Requests
    // Data Gem == Group membership of a Data Source, Data Source won't be revealed
    claims={[
      {
        // Stand with Crypto NFT Minter Gem (= part of the Stand with Crypto NFT Minter Group)
        // https://sismo-prod-hub-data.s3.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/group-snapshot-store/0xfae674b6cba3ff2f8ce2114defb200b1/1688203882.json
        // note: dhadrien.sismo.eth part of group with value 10 (minted 10 NFT)
        groupId: "0xfae674b6cba3ff2f8ce2114defb200b1",
        // default: claimType: ClaimType.GTE
        // default value: 1,
        // default isSelectableByUser: false,
      },
      {
        // Gitcoin Passport Gem (= part of the Gitcoin Passport Group)
        // https://sismo-prod-hub-data.s3.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/group-snapshot-store/0x1cde61966decb8600dfd0749bd371f12/1688218897.json
        // note dhadrien.sismo.eth is part of the group with score 46
        groupId: "0x1cde61966decb8600dfd0749bd371f12",
        claimType: ClaimType.GTE, // member of the group with value greater or equal to 15
        value: 15,
      },
      {
        // Stand with Crypto NFT Minter Gem, dhadrien.sismo.eth minted 10
        groupId: "0xfae674b6cba3ff2f8ce2114defb200b1",
        claimType: ClaimType.EQ, // member of the group with value equal to 10
        value: 10,
      },
      {
        // Gitcoin Passport Gem, dhadrien.sismo.eth: score 46
        groupId: "0x1cde61966decb8600dfd0749bd371f12",
        claimType: ClaimType.EQ, // member of the group with value == 15
        value: 15, // 46 not equal to 15 => won't be able to generate ZK PRoof
        isSelectableByUser: true, // can selectively disclose more if user wants
        isOptional: true,
      },
      {
        // Stand with Crypto NFT Minter Gem, dhadrien.sismo.eth minted 10
        groupId: "0xfae674b6cba3ff2f8ce2114defb200b1", //
        claimType: ClaimType.GTE, // member of the group
        isSelectableByUser: true, // can selectively disclose more if user wants
        isOptional: true, // can chose not to reveal
      },
      {
        // Gitcoin Passport Gem, dhadrien.sismo.eth: score 46
        groupId: "0x1cde61966decb8600dfd0749bd371f12",
        claimType: ClaimType.GTE, // member of the group with value greater or equal to 5
        value: 25,
        isSelectableByUser: true, // can selectively disclose more if user wants
      },
    ]}
    // we ask the user to sign a message
    signature={{message: "I love Sismo!", isSelectableByUser: true,}}
    // onResponseBytes calls a 'setResponse' function with the responseBytes returned by the Sismo Vault
    onResponse={ async (response: SismoConnectResponse) => {
      await fetch("/api/verify", {
        method: "POST",
        body: JSON.stringify(response),
      })
    }}
  />
)}
```



### Verify the Sismo Connect Response in a simple backend

<details>

<summary>Sismo Connect Response from the previous Request</summary>

Copy-pasted from the test Sismo Connect Request ðŸ‘‰ [https://test-request.sismo.io ](https://test-request.sismo.io)

```typescript


const sismoConnectResponse:SismoConnectResponse = 
    {
      "appId": "0x32403ced4b65f2079eda77c84e7d2be6",
      "namespace": "main",
      "version": "sismo-connect-v1.1",
      "signedMessage": "I love Sismo!",
      "proofs": [
        {
          "auths": [
            {
              "authType": 0,
```

</details>

```typescript
// backend

import {
  SismoConnect,
  AuthType,
  SismoConnectVerifiedResult,
  ClaimType,
  SismoConnectConfig,
  SignatureRequest,
  AuthRequest,
  ClaimRequest,
  SismoConnectResponse
} from "@sismo-core/sismo-connect-server";

// reusing the exact same config as the frontend's
const sismoConnect = SismoConnect({ config });

const result: SismoConnectVerifiedResult = await sismoConnect.verify(
      sismoConnectResponse, // copied from previous step or received from api call
      {
        auths,
        claims,
        signature,
      }
    );

console.log(result.getUserIds(AuthType.VAULT));
// vault anonymous identifier = hash(vaultSecret, AppId)
// ['0x225c5b67c39778b40ef2528707c9fbdfed96f31b9a50826b95c2ac40e15e4c6b']
console.log(result.getUserIds(AuthType.GITHUB));
// [ '35774097' ] github id of @dhadrien
console.log(result.getUserIds(AuthType.TWITTER));
// [ '2390703980' ] twitter id of @dhadrien_
console.log(result.getUserIds(AuthType.EVM_ACCOUNT));
// [
//   '0x8ab1760889f26cbbf33a75fd2cf1696bfccdc9e6', // dhadrien.sismo.eth
//   '0xa4c94a6091545e40fc9c3e0982aec8942e282f38' // request EVM auth
// ]
console.log(result.getUserIds(AuthType.TELEGRAM));
// [ '875608110' ] // telegram id of @dhadrien 

```
